content: welcome to the video tutorial pattern to create this cute bat with magnet perfect for decorating during the halloween season español https //youtu be/jztiqnof69c english https //youtu be/cztq4aqtdjc yarn used dark purple 18 you can find it here https //s click aliexpress com/e/_ddu6mrx halloween ghost with magnet free https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/halloween-ghost-with-magnet halloween pumpkin with magnet free https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/halloween-pumpkin-with-magnet difficulty level 1/5 beginner easy available languages english spanish final size 5cm / 2 inches tall varies depending on materials used colors cotton yarn any color important note you can also get the written pattern in my etsy store https //amigurumisatina etsy com/listing/1790834528 please note this pattern is for personal use only it is prohibited to share distribute or publish this pattern on social networks or any other means ✅ you can sell the finished items don t forget to give credit to amigurumisatina as the designer enjoy crocheting and may your bat come to life with lots of love happy halloween
